thread.section_title: Oponeo Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Oponeo | oponeo.ie
thread.title: Gavin

author: Gavin
title: Gavin
text:
Would definitely recommend this site to my friends. Made a great saving compared to Irish tyre shops and their ridiculous mark ups.
I had a query before I ordered and they got back to me really quick. My tyres arrived 4 days after I ordered them and I could track them very accurately the whole time through DPD. Will definitely use this site again. Why pay â‚¬70+ for budget tyres in Ireland when you get quality brands for the same money or less here?
